biotools.summary: E-PIX® is a record linkage tool for managing multi-million patients in research projects at a large university hospital in Germany. The Record Linkage and ID Management solution E-PIX (Enterprise Identifier Cross Referencing) applies the propabilistic Fellegi-Sunter-algorithm and the Levenshtein distance to avoid duplicate participant entries. The independent software module facilitates participant management and multisite-aggregation of medical research data.
